summary: A convict fresh out of prison, with a handicapped sister, is coerced by a wealthy mob boss into organizing an armored racetrack car heist.
cast: Jô Shishido|Chieko Matsubara|Tamio Kawaji|Yuji Kodaka|Minako Katsuki|Hiroshi Nihon'yanagi|Hiroshi Kondô|Shôbun Inoue|Saburô Hiromatsu|Junichi Yamanobe|Yûzô Kiura|Zenji Yamada|Kôichi Uenoyama|Kôtarô Sugie|Yasukiyo Umeno|Jun Miyazaki|Zenyu Kamoda|Kôjirô Kusanagi|Shuntarô Tamamura|Masaru Kamiyama|Kôji Yashiro|Kyosuke Aihara|Gô Kuroda|Masaaki Honme|Kakuo Watai|Masatoshi Kawase|Ei Shirai|Kiyoshi Matsuoka|Sônosuke Niki|Midori Mori|Kasumi Motegi|Yôko Yokota|Setsuko Watanabe|Yoshihiko Tabata|Shirô Oshimi|Tooru Moriya|Kuniya Mizukawa|Tadao Kojima|Kenzô Matsui|Yoshiyuki Nemoto|Jirô Horisaki|Kôichi Sasaki|Akifumi Inoue
title: Kenjû zankoku monogatari
